subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Luol Deng had 25 points and 13 rebounds on 10-of-15 shooting from the field, helping the Bulls narrow the Pistons lead to 3-1 in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: Luol Deng had 25 points and 13 rebounds on 10-of-15 shooting from the field, helping the Bulls narrow the Pistons lead to 3-1 in the best-of-seven series.
